greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The number of walks of n steps on the hexagonal lattice that start at the origin and end at the non-adjacent vertex (2,0).
example: There are a(3)=6 paths with 3 steps: RUD, RDU, DRU, DUR, URD, UDR.
xref: Cf. A002898 (returns to origin), A337905, A337907.
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 29 2020
